General.Name: Makina Takim Endustrisi AS
General.Description: Makina Takim Endüstrisi A.S. engages in the manufacture and sale of cutting tools in Turkey. It offers twist drills, taps, dies, thread chasers, reamers, countersinks, milling cutters, tool bits, and saws, as well as solid carbide drills, end mills, and reamers. The company also manufactures specially designed products for automotive, defense, machine and white appliances, and other industrial customers. It also exports its products. The company was incorporated in 1957 and is based in Gebze, Turkey.
